TiTimeOffset.TiTimeOffsetCollection, TriggerTimeWindow, TriggerTimeWindow.TriggerTimeWindowCollection

    public interface DatabaseObject
    This is a simple ORM interface for mapping Java objects to a database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete()
      Delete the object from the database, using its table name from the meta data and row ID.
      TableMetaData getTableMetaData()
      Get the TableMetaData for this object.
      void insert()
      Insert the data of this object into the database.
      boolean isNew()
      Return true if the record
      boolean select(int id)
      Select information from the database into this object using the row ID.
      void setConnection(Connection connection)
      Set the database Connection for the object.
      void setTableMetaData(TableMetaData tableMetaData)
      Set the table meta data of the object.
      boolean update()
      Update the information in the database from this object.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        void delete()
     throws DatabaseObjectException,
            SQLException
        Delete the object from the database, using its table name from the meta data and row ID.
        Throws:
        ConditionsObjectException - if there was an error deleting the object
        SQLException - if there was a SQL query error
        DatabaseObjectException

      • getTableMetaData

        TableMetaData getTableMetaData()
        Get the TableMetaData for this object.
        Returns:
        the TableMetaData for this object.

      • insert

        void insert()
     throws DatabaseObjectException,
            SQLException
        Insert the data of this object into the database.

        This could be a single object or a collection of objects depending on the implementation.

        Throws:
        ConditionsObjectException
        SQLException
        DatabaseObjectException

      • isNew

        boolean isNew()
        Return true if the record
        Returns:
        true if the object is new

      • select

        boolean select(int id)
        throws DatabaseObjectException,
               SQLException
        Select information from the database into this object using the row ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the row ID
        Returns:
        true if the select operation worked
        Throws:
        DatabaseObjectException - if there was an error selecting information into this object
        SQLException - if there was a query error

      • setConnection

        void setConnection(Connection connection)
        Set the database Connection for the object.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database Connection for the object

      • setTableMetaData

        void setTableMetaData(TableMetaData tableMetaData)
        Set the table meta data of the object.
        Parameters:
        tableMetaData - the table meta data of the object
        See Also:
        TableMetaData

      • update

        boolean update()
        throws DatabaseObjectException,
               SQLException
        Update the information in the database from this object.
        Returns:
        true if an update occurred
        Throws:
        ConditionsObjectException - if there is an error performing the update from the object
        SQLException - if there is a SQL query error
        DatabaseObjectException
